title: 8 Books on the Science of the Body and Brain
sub_head: Recommended reading that unlocks the universe within.
body:
How is our consciousness shaped by our perceptions? Why does pain sometimes become pleasure? Whatâ€™s the line between eccentricity and mental illness? Some of the greatest and most urgent mysteries investigated by researchers are those involving our minds and bodies. Here are eight recent books discussed by WSJ reviewers that unpack the science of our inner worlds.
By Anil Seth | Dutton
